publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4556 Rob Gibson: Celebrating Thomas Telfordâ€”That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Wick Paths Project on the organisation of the upcoming three-day event in Caithness from 3 to 5 July celebrating the genius of Thomas Telford, the designer and builder; welcomes the group of engineers making the trip; further recognises the economic benefit to the county and the lasting impact that Thomas Telford made culturally, architecturally and socially on this beautiful part of our country, and wishes it every success with this innovative and important initiative.
S3M-4556 Celebrating Thomas Telford (lodged on 2 July 2009) Christine Grahame*, Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*
